question:
Arrange chronologically the following Indian states according to their joining years into Subsidiary Alliance
1. Hyderabad
2. Awadh
3. Tanjore
4. Scindia
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: Chronologically order of the Indian states according to their joining years into Subsidiary Alliance- Nizam of Hyderabad (1798), Tanjore (1799), Awadh ( 1801), Bajirao II (1802), Scindia (1803), Gaekwad (1803).
